verses.verse: וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav then אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And the men אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- unto him Why hast thou הַדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var us thus הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh is this עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta served לָּ֔נוּ La-nu, לְבִלְתִּי֙ <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not קְרֹ֣אות <S%H7121><s%> ke-Rot that thou calledst לָ֔נוּ La-nu, כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki when הָלַ֖כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach-ta us not when thou wentest לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem to fight בְּמִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> be-mid-Yan; Midian וַיְרִיב֥וּן <S%H7378><s%> vay-ri-Vun adversary אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To for בְּחָזְקָֽה׃ <S%H2394><s%> be-cha-ze-Kah. with him sharply

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to מֶה־ <S%H4100><s%> meh- What עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti unto them What have I done עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah now כָּכֶ֑ם ka-Chem; הֲל֗וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo, not ט֛וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov better עֹלְל֥וֹת <S%H5955><s%> o-le-Lot now in comparison of you;[Is] not the gleaning אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim of the grapes of Ephraim מִבְצִ֥יר <S%H1210><s%> miv-Tzir than the vintage אֲבִיעֶֽזֶר׃ <S%H44><s%> 'a-vi-'E-zer. Abiezer

בְּיֶדְכֶם֩ <S%H3027><s%> be-yed-Chem into your hands נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan hath delivered אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei the princes מִדְיָן֙ <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan of Midian אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֹרֵ֣ב <S%H6159><s%> 'o-Rev Oreb וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et זְאֵ֔ב <S%H2062><s%> ze-'Ev, and Zeeb וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- and what יָּכֹ֖לְתִּי <S%H3201><s%> ya-Cho-le-ti and what was I able עֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> a-Sot to do כָּכֶ֑ם ka-Chem; אָ֗ז <S%H227><s%> 'Az, Then רָפְתָ֤ה <S%H7503><s%> ra-fe-Tah was abated רוּחָם֙ <S%H7307><s%> ru-Cham in comparison of you;Then their anger מֵֽעָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lav, and בְּדַבְּר֖וֹ <S%H1696><s%> be-dab-be-Ro that הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var toward him when he had said הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. him

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came גִדְע֖וֹן <S%H1439><s%> gid-'on And Gideon הַיַּרְדֵּ֑נָה <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-De-nah; to Jordan עֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> 'o-Ver [and] passed over ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> u-she-losh- he and the three מֵא֤וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for עֲיֵפִ֖ים <S%H5889><s%> 'a-ye-Fim that [were] with him faint וְרֹדְפִֽים׃ <S%H7291><s%> ve-ro-de-Fim. yet pursuing

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> le-'an-Shei unto the men סֻכּ֔וֹת <S%H5523><s%> suk-Kot, of Succoth תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> te-nu- Give נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> na Please כִּכְּר֣וֹת <S%H3603><s%> kik-ke-Rot I pray you loaves לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem, of bread לָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am unto the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּרַגְלָ֑י <S%H7272><s%> be-rag-Lai; that follow כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עֲיֵפִ֣ים <S%H5889><s%> 'a-ye-Fim me for they [be] faint הֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem, like וְאָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi, and I רֹדֵ֛ף <S%H7291><s%> ro-Def and I am pursuing אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after זֶ֥בַח <S%H2078><s%> Ze-vach Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֖ע <S%H6759><s%> ve-tzal-mun-Na' and Zalmunna מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei kings מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan. of Midian

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei And the princes סֻכּ֔וֹת <S%H5523><s%> suk-Kot, of Succoth הֲ֠כַף <S%H3709><s%> Ha-chaf [Are] the hands זֶ֧בַח <S%H2078><s%> Ze-vach of Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֛ע <S%H6759><s%> ve-tzal-mun-Na' and Zalmunna עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah already בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha; now in thine hand כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- should נִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> nit-Ten that we should give לִֽצְבָאֲךָ֖ <S%H6635><s%> litz-va-'a-Cha appointed time לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> La-chem. bread

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said גִּדְע֔וֹן <S%H1439><s%> gid-'on, And Gideon לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, right בְּתֵ֧ת <S%H5414><s%> be-Tet hath delivered יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Therefore when the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זֶ֥בַח <S%H2078><s%> Ze-vach Zebah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et צַלְמֻנָּ֖ע <S%H6759><s%> tzal-mun-Na' and Zalmunna בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di; into mine hand וְדַשְׁתִּי֙ <S%H1758><s%> ve-dash-Ti then I will tear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּשַׂרְכֶ֔ם <S%H1320><s%> be-sar-Chem, your flesh אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with קוֹצֵ֥י <S%H6975><s%> ko-Tzei with the thorns הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar of the wilderness וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et and with הַֽבַּרְקֳנִֽים׃ <S%H1303><s%> Hab-bar-ko-Nim. and with briers

וַיַּ֤עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al And he went up מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there פְּנוּאֵ֔ל <S%H6439><s%> pe-nu-'El, thence to Penuel וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber and spake אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem unto כָּזֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> ka-Zot; unto them likewise וַיַּעֲנ֤וּ <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya-'a-Nu answered אוֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei and the men פְנוּאֵ֔ל <S%H6439><s%> fe-nu-'El, of Penuel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after עָנ֖וּ <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Nu had answered אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei as the men סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5523><s%> suk-Kot. of Succoth

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he spake גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also לְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> le-'an-Shei to the men פְנוּאֵ֖ל <S%H6439><s%> fe-nu-'El of Penuel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying בְּשׁוּבִ֣י <S%H7725><s%> be-shu-Vi When I come again בְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> ve-sha-Lom, in peace אֶתֹּ֖ץ <S%H5422><s%> 'et-Totz I will break down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּגְדָּ֥ל <S%H4026><s%> ham-mig-Dal this tower הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this פ Peh

וְזֶ֨בַח <S%H2078><s%> ve-Ze-vach Now Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֜ע <S%H6759><s%> ve-tzal-mun-Na' and Zalmunna בַּקַּרְקֹ֗ר <S%H7174><s%> bak-kar-Kor, [were] in Karkor וּמַחֲנֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H4264><s%> u-ma-cha-nei-Hem and their hosts עִמָּם֙ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mam with כַּחֲמֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> ka-cha-Me-shet fif עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> kol that הַנּ֣וֹתָרִ֔ים <S%H3498><s%> han-No-ta-Rim, [men] all that were left מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol of all מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh of all the hosts בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children קֶ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem; of the east וְהַנֹּ֣פְלִ֔ים <S%H5307><s%> ve-han-No-fe-Lim, for there fell מֵאָ֨ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish men שֹׁ֥לֵֽף <S%H8025><s%> Sho-lef that drew חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> Cha-rev. sword

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al went up גִּדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> gid-'on, And Gideon דֶּ֚רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech by the way הַשְּׁכוּנֵ֣י <S%H7931><s%> hash-she-chu-Nei of them that dwelt בָֽאֳהָלִ֔ים <S%H168><s%> vo-'o-ha-Lim, in tents מִקֶּ֥דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem on the east לְנֹ֖בַח <S%H5025><s%> le-Noach of Nobah וְיָגְבֳּהָ֑ה <S%H3011><s%> ve-ya-ge-bo-Hah; and Jogbehah וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yaCh and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh, the host וְהַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> ve-ham-ma-cha-Neh for the host הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah become בֶֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> Ve-tach. was secure

וַיָּנ֗וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> vai-ya-Nu-su, fled זֶ֚בַח <S%H2078><s%> Ze-vach And when Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <S%H6759><s%> ve-tzal-mun-Na', and Zalmunna וַיִּרְדֹּ֖ף <S%H7291><s%> vai-yir-Dof he pursued אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem; after וַיִּלְכֹּ֞ד <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-Kod them and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁנֵ֣י׀ <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei the two מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei kings מִדְיָ֗ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan, of Midian אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זֶ֙בַח֙ <S%H2078><s%> ze-vach Zebah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et צַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <S%H6759><s%> tzal-mun-Na', and Zalmunna וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol the whole הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh all the host הֶחֱרִֽיד׃ <S%H2729><s%> he-che-Rid. and discomfited

וַיָּ֛שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov returned גִּדְע֥וֹן <S%H1439><s%> gid-'on And Gideon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <S%H3101><s%> yo-'Ash of Joash מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah; from battle מִֽלְמַעֲלֵ֖ה <S%H4608><s%> mil-ma-'a-Leh before הֶחָֽרֶס׃ <S%H2775><s%> he-Cha-res. the sun

וַיִּלְכָּד־ <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-kod- And caught נַ֛עַר <S%H5288><s%> Na-'ar a young man מֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> me-'an-Shei of the men סֻכּ֖וֹת <S%H5523><s%> suk-Kot of Succoth וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֑הוּ <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'a-Le-hu; and enquired וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> vai-yich-To of him and he described אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei unto him the princes סֻכּוֹת֙ <S%H5523><s%> suk-kOt of Succoth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et זְקֵנֶ֔יהָ <S%H2205><s%> ze-ke-Nei-ha, and the elders שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im seventy-seven וְשִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'Ah seven אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish. men

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo And he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men סֻכּ֔וֹת <S%H5523><s%> suk-Kot, of Succoth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said הִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold זֶ֣בַח <S%H2078><s%> Ze-vach Behold Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֑ע <S%H6759><s%> ve-tzal-mun-Na'; and Zalmunna אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom חֵרַפְתֶּ֨ם <S%H2778><s%> che-raf-Tem with whom ye did upbraid אוֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> o-Ti לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, me saying הֲ֠כַף <S%H3709><s%> Ha-chaf [Are] the hands זֶ֣בַח <S%H2078><s%> Ze-vach of Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֤ע <S%H6759><s%> ve-tzal-mun-Na' and Zalmunna עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah already בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha, now in thine hand כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki should נִתֵּ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> nit-Ten that we should give לַאֲנָשֶׁ֥יךָ <S%H376><s%> la-'a-na-Shei-cha to your men הַיְּעֵפִ֖ים <S%H3286><s%> hai-ye-'e-Fim faint לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> La-chem. bread
